title: [Skin] Steeldriver Taric
body:
I propose a new skin for Taric, based loosely on John Henry.

Goals:

* Create a Taric skin that isn't just the same model wearing a different colour/style of armour
* Bake some cheesecake for players who want sexy, masculine splash art

Characteristics:

* Although Taric is white, this skin would have to be black.  Otherwise, it would be irreverent.
* Instead of a giant gemstone hammer, he should be armed with a steeldriver's sledge.
* He should be shirtless.
* He should retain his mane of hair but probably in the form of braids or dreadlocks.

replies.body: This is a great idea and I am 100% in favour of more beefcake (to balance out the enormous amounts of cheesecake). And especially more racial diversity in skins!
Or a mullet. Then he can have a mallet and a mullet.
